title: Atlassian security advisory (AV25-152)
description: On March 18, 2025, Atlassian published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Bamboo Data Center and Server   multiple versions
Bitbucket Data Center and Server   multiple versions
Crowd Data Center and Server   multiple versions
Jira Data Center and Server   multiple versions
Jira Service Management Data Center and Server   multiple versions
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
